summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MISKOS 35 Colors All Glitter Glow Eyeshadow Palette Shimmer 35OS Pigmented Warm Eyes Makeup Shadow Set
Review Date: 2018/10/09
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Glow', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 7.09 x 0.79 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '680491812513'}
Review Text: I was so shocked because of the price how well this product worked I put on three layers of different glitter Shades Shimmer Shades just to test it out to see if it would get Chunky on my eye and it never got chunky it's not very pigmented to where it's like shocking but it works it's good it's a very toned-down great product though it gives me advice of morphe palettes or you want to get your daughter her first pallet this is a good palate I can't say about their hurt there matte colors but for the shimmers there shimmers are so creamy and so nice
Review Title: I recommend a hundred percent to buy this this is a fantastic product
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch
Review Date: 2022/02/17
Store: Persephone
Product Description: ['Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch']
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Color': 'curly headband', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'Persephone', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.7 x 9.1 x 1.4 inches; 6.07 Ounces'}
Review Text: The wig was too small for me and honestly not my style but it was soft hair with a pretty headband I can see this looking good on someone a bit older or likes short hair but it just wasn't my style it also smelled a bit strange so that through me off
Review Title: Too small and not my style at all
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===

Store: Marine Forest
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '2.17 x 0.79 x 0.79 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '762403782777'}
Review Text: I have the real brad of this these here are smaller and if you get any inside your mouth oh Lord! It feels like you ate pepper on your tongue 😜 it don't plump your lips it's just a peppery lip gloss I would pass on this one ; on that note they do have  cute packaging and cute names on each lip gloss so you know what one to use.
Review Title: It's very peppery but don't plump lips
Rating: 4.0

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The person demonstrates a solid preference for versatile beauty products, focusing primarily on eyeshadow palettes, hair extensions, and lip care items. Consistent ratings reveal a clear appreciation for quality relative to price, as seen in positive sentiments towards reasonably priced products that perform well. A strong rating was given to products with effective performance, such as creamy shimmers and quality hair bundles, indicating an inclination towards functionality and value.

Common themes across their purchases include a preference for products designed for both everyday use and special occasions, such as eye makeup and enhancements that elevate overall appearance. Additionally, there is a notable dissatisfaction with products that do not meet quality expectations, particularly evident in the lower ratings for items perceived as gimmicky or lacking essential features.

Quality preferences lean towards soft, easy-to-use materials, especially in hair products, while risks are taken on items with innovative features, like lip enhancers. Price sensitivity reflects a willingness to spend on items perceived as high value, yet they show a discerning eye for effectiveness over expensive alternatives. Overall, the core preferences suggest a consumer focused on practicality and aesthetic enhancement while remaining budget-conscious.

target_interaction.title: Beautiful curly soft wig
target_interaction.text: This wig is sooo soft wow! I loved it the softness plus shine and if your not into the wet look it is still super soft and beautiful 🥰 you can  not beat it for the value of it. I wish that had this in honey bc I would buy it great quality human hair wig!
